segments.text: So you are green with envy at your neighbor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he ’ s really lucky . It seems that he could win the bet at every turn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don ’ t envy those who are filthy with dough . That ’ s not the whole life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you mean . I ’ m not only after bucks . There ’ s something more in life .
segments.speaker: S2
